linttt

```{r}
for(.x in seq_along(pickDate)){
  drug$data$date[[.x+1]] <- pickDate[[.x]]
}
```

is the same as

```{r}
# since length(pickDate) == 14823
drug$data$date[2:14824] <- pickDate[1:14823]
# Or
drug$data$date[seq_along(pickDate)+1] <- pickDate[seq_along(pickDate)]
```
